item.content:encoded:
Hi Ben,
One post a week would be awesome (just make it a game review)! Thanks for all the help! Happy New Year

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Those are fine reasons for a redesign - just keep in mind that it's a big time investment and has somewhat more precarious payoff than time spent creating content.
item.content:encoded: Those are fine reasons for a redesign – just keep in mind that it’s a big time investment and has somewhat more precarious payoff than time spent creating content.

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: I can help you troubleshoot the CSS issue, but I'd need to poke around your WP admin. Hit me up on AIM (nateeagle5) if you'd like an assist.
item.content:encoded: I can help you troubleshoot the CSS issue, but I’d need to poke around your WP admin. Hit me up on AIM (nateeagle5) if you’d like an assist.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: AHHH IT BROKE AGAIN!!! I don't know why it's being so temperamental!!!! Have you ever heard of any problems with Wordpress CSS going in and out?! GAH! It usually fixes after a few refreshes though. Then again, might be another problem with my hosting service. BLEH! And to answer your question, I think that the design is just not quite what I'm looking for yet. In addition, I really should take pride in my ability to design and create a layout and visual UI that's of my own volition instead of relying on free templates. And in addition, I think that the overall blog's user experience could use some enhancements. (Maybe I'm wrong?) So those are my reasons for the redesign. =)
item.content:encoded:
AHHH IT BROKE AGAIN!!! I don’t know why it’s being so temperamental!!!! Have you ever heard of any problems with WordPress CSS going in and out?! GAH! It usually fixes after a few refreshes though. Then again, might be another problem with my hosting service. BLEH!
And to answer your question, I think that the design is just not quite what I’m looking for yet. In addition, I really should take pride in my ability to design and create a layout and visual UI that’s of my own volition instead of relying on free templates. And in addition, I think that the overall blog’s user experience could use some enhancements. (Maybe I’m wrong?) So those are my reasons for the redesign. =)

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: A redesign is well and good, but is there a reason you've gone CSS-naked today? ;) More seriously: the impulse to redesign is something I've felt *so* many times, but it's almost always something that gets in the way of making actual content. Is there a specific problem you're trying to solve with your redesign, or do you just feel that your current design's not quite as awesome as you'd like?
item.content:encoded:
A redesign is well and good, but is there a reason you’ve gone CSS-naked today? ðŸ˜‰
More seriously: the impulse to redesign is something I’ve felt *so* many times, but it’s almost always something that gets in the way of making actual content. Is there a specific problem you’re trying to solve with your redesign, or do you just feel that your current design’s not quite as awesome as you’d like?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: The templates are quite clean and simplistic. The only downside is that they make you run on their own technology (which is actually great for most customers since it removes a lot of the headache of coding and what not). Unfortunately for me though, that would be a show-stopper since I'm utilizing a different platform (i.e., WordPress). Thanks for the suggestion though!
item.content:encoded: The templates are quite clean and simplistic. The only downside is that they make you run on their own technology (which is actually great for most customers since it removes a lot of the headache of coding and what not). Unfortunately for me though, that would be a show-stopper since I’m utilizing a different platform (i.e., WordPress). Thanks for the suggestion though!
